page.title: 20CREDITS & CONCLUSIONS
page.content: Our twelve-kilometre block was divided between the following schools:Portsmouth Sixth Form College(the computer centre),St.Lukes,City of Portsmouth Boys,Lyndhurst Middle, and Langstone Middle.The block covered was of mixed interest, with the edges consisting of large areas of sea and a motorway crossing the northern part. Difficulties encountered in doing the survey were :schools not in the areas of study,sending children out unsupervised,finding teacher colleagues to cover lessons,getting permission for students in secondary schools to miss lessons, finding time to collate the findings after school. The project guidelines were well-documented and clear;consequently the project was easy and enjoyable to do.
